description: Smart InteractiveAchieved with Gen2 VL800 USB3.0 Host Controller from VIA-Labs,ORICO PVU3-4P USB3.0 4 Port PCI Express Card allow to add 4 Super Speed USB3.0 Ports for your Desktop Computer Easily via Available PCI Express Socket,Offer Transfer Rates Up To 5Gbps for each Downstream USB3.0 Host,10x Faster of USB2.0 and Backward Compatible with USB2.0,1.1 or 1.0.4PIN IDE/ATA Power Connector allow to Power the Card via Power Supply of Computer Easily,Offer 5V 900mA Power for each Port.Integrated Filtering Unit with Solid Capacitors allow a Reliable and Secure Connectivity .ORICO PVU3-4P Compatible with Windows XP,2003,Vista,2008,7,Windows 8 32 or 64Bit with WHQL Certified Driver and Compatible with Various Linux Kernels with Nature Driver.If you are Running Out of USB Ports or wanna have Super Speed USB3.0,ORICO PVU3-4P with 4x High-Throughput USB3.0 Hosts will be a Key Solution for you Update your Computer to USB3.0 and Transfer Your Files in a Breeze.Compatibility & Installation-4PIN Power Supply is Required to be Attached-4x Plug and Play USB3.0 Hosts Compatible with any USB3.0,2.0,1.1 or 1.0 Devices-Compatible with Any Windows or Linux Desktop Computer with Available PCI Express x1,x2,x4, x8 or x16 Socket-Compliant with PCI Express Base Specification 2.0 and Compatible with PCI Express 3.0,1.0-This Item Can't Fit in PCI Socket and not Compatible with Low-Profile PCI Chassises-ORICO PVU3 Series is NOT Compatible with Mac Computer.Please Select ORICO PFU3 Series when add USB3.0 Ports for Mac,Or you can Contact ORICO Customer Care Team for Support if Any IssueWhat's in the Box1x ORICO PVU3-4P1x Driver CD with WHQL Driver1x Mounting Screw1x User's Manual1x Warranty Card
title: ORICO PVU3-4P USB 3.0 PCI-Express Host Controller Card with 4 Port,PCI-Express to USB 3.0 HUB Controller Adapter Card , Black PCI Edition (4 Port Outside)
